alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 5:18AM AKST until February 15 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...NEXT WEATHER FRONT WITH SNOW TO IMPACT SOUTHEAST TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... .Moist warm air overrunning the cooler air in place over the panhandle will result in accumulating snow Tuesday evening across the region. Most favorable locations for the higher snowfall accumulations are over Yakutat and portions of the Icy Strait Corridor to Juneau. Due to expected greater snowfall rates in those areas, those advisories have been upgraded to warnings. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From noon today to noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Tuesday evening. Mixing with rain is likely mid morning Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
